name: Pixel Farm
tagline: Talent. Flexibility. All under one roof.
description:
Pixel Farm is a multidisciplinary creative content studio based in Minneapolis. We offer all facets of creative, from strategy and ideation through design, production and delivery. With everything under one roof we are able to meet the needs of our clients and collaborators with custom content solutions that are impactful, nimble, and innovative.
Our driving spirit is a philosophy that anything can be accomplished when the most capable technology is put in the hands of the very best creatives and technicians. We create work that fosters authentic, lasting connections between brands and consumers, stories and audiences.
READ MORE...
